name: multi-agent-skills
description: Skill-based architecture for multi-agent business workflows

scripts.list-skills: node -e "const {SkillRegistry} = require('./core/skill_registry'); const r = new SkillRegistry(); r.loadSkillsFromDirectory('./').then(() => console.log(JSON.stringify(r.getAvailableSkills(), null, 2))).catch(console.error);"
scripts.health-check: node -e "const {SkillRegistry} = require('./core/skill_registry'); const r = new SkillRegistry(); r.loadSkillsFromDirectory('./').then(() => r.healthCheckAllSkills()).then(console.log).catch(console.error);"

author: Business Intelligence Team
